lines.text: Guitar is an instrument with fixed endpoints
Possible wavelengths differ from two open ends

secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe [OBJ:expsec_n280:harmonics].
2. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_n280mi:wavelength] of a harmonic.
3. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_n281:frequency] of a harmonic.
4. Calculate the frequency of a harmonic with [OBJ:expsec_n282:two fixed ends].
5. Calculate the frequency of a harmonic with [OBJ:expsec_n284:two open ends].
6. Calculate the frequency of a harmonic with [OBJ:expsec_n285:one closed end].
7. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_flutepipe_question:calculate the harmonic] of a flute.
8. Identify [OBJ:expsec_n286:examples of instruments] with open and closed ends.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_36688:Calculate] the frequency of a pipe with one open end.
